attributes.long-description:
Hey hey, come on over have some fun with Crrrrrazy Taxi! Crazy Combo your way to Crazy Money in a wild frantic race to scare up the most fares.

Remastered for digital download with HD graphics, leaderboards and trophy awards. Two Game Modes – Arcade Mode and Original Mode for a variety of gameplay, and 16 Mini Games to hone your taxi driving skills.

SEGA is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo and Crazy Taxi are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA Corporation. © SEGA. All rights reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.

SEGA is registered in the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office. SEGA, the SEGA logo and Crazy Taxi are either registered trademarks or trademarks of SEGA Corporation. © SEGA. All rights reserved.
